name: RTC読み込み
func:
var buf = new Buffer(8); 
buf[0]=0x53;//start
buf[1]=0x64;//i2c addr (0x32<1)
buf[2]=0x01;//send data 1
buf[3]=0x00;//offset 0
buf[4]=0x53;//restart
buf[5]=0x65;//i2c addr (0x32<1)+1, write addr+1 = read addr
buf[6]=0x07;//recieve data 7
buf[7]=0x50;//stop
msg.payload = buf;
return msg;
